verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he that considereth <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%>: the YY <S%H3068><s%> will deliver <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him in time <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H7451><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> will preserve <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and keep him alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; and he shall be blessed <S%H833><s%> <S%H8795><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>: and thou wilt not deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of his enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> will strengthen <S%H5582><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him upon the bed <S%H6210><s%> of languishing <S%H1741><s%>: thou wilt make <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all his bed <S%H4904><s%> in his sickness <S%H2483><s%>.

I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, YY <S%H3068><s%>, be merciful <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me: heal <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; for I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against thee.

Mine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> of me, When shall he die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and his name <S%H8034><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ?

And if he come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> me, he speaketh <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%>: his heart <S%H3820><s%> gathereth <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8799><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> to itself; when he goeth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%>, he telleth <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it.
All that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me whisper <S%H3907><s%> <S%H8691><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against me: against me do they devise <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.

An evil <S%H1100><s%> disease <S%H1697><s%>, say they, cleaveth fast <S%H3332><s%> <S%H8803><s%> unto him: and now that he lieth <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8800><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

Yea, mine own familiar <S%H7965><s%> friend <S%H376><s%>, in whom I trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, which did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of my bread <S%H3899><s%>, hath lifted up <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his heel <S%H6119><s%> against me.
But thou, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, be merciful <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto me, and raise me up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, that I may requite <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them.
By this I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou favourest <S%H2654><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me, because mine enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> doth not triumph <S%H7321><s%> <S%H8686><s%> over me.
And as for me, thou upholdest <S%H8551><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me in mine integrity <S%H8537><s%>, and settest <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me before thy face <S%H6440><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8803><s%> be the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%>, and to everlasting <S%H5769><s%>. Amen <S%H543><s%>, and Amen <S%H543><s%>.
